ygData.subject: RE: [RE: [eqbards] How do you play this game?]
ygData.msgSnippet: Hehe.  I have a DE necro that I started, but had semi-retired him, because I was so lost, I couldn t get back out of the city.  Fortunately, he had just hit
ygData.messageBody:
Hehe. I have a DE necro that I started, but had semi-retired him, because I
was so lost, I couldn't get back out of the city. Fortunately, he had just
hit level 4, and had spare money, so I remembered to buy the gate spell, and
gated out

Gotta remember to use different tricks with different classes :)

Bien
p.s. Yes, it took be about 3 weeks before I remembered I could buy gate,
hehe

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Kevin L. Crawford [SMTP:Lyrnia@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 20, 2000 2:59 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: Re: [RE: [eqbards] How do you play this game?]
>
> heh, you obviously haven't played a dark elf. Talk about a confusing
> city.
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "Webber, Jessica" <webber@...>
> To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
> Sent: Thursday, April 20, 2000 2:20 PM
> Subject: RE: [RE: [eqbards] How do you play this game?]
>
>
> > My theory on that is that someone decided that Kelethin should be the
> most
> > difficult town in the game. It's easy to get lost. It's easy to fall
> off
> > if your unfamilar with it. And it's easy to get frustrated as a newbie
> when
> > the elevator you've seen going up and down won't come down when you get
> to
> > the platform. (my first char was a wood elf bard, not Evulia though,
> and
> I
> > honestly had no idea how the elevators worked. I think I made it to
> level
> > three before figuring it out)
> >
> > Peace
> > Evulia, bard of 10 verses, Tunare
> >
> >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: Harmonie Moonsong [mailto:harmoniemoonsong@...]
> > > Sent: Thursday, April 20, 2000 2:16 PM
> > > To: eqbards@egroups.com
> > > Subject: Re: [RE: [eqbards] How do you play this game?]
> > >
> > >
> > > The default is the U key. in settings it is the one
> > > called use center screen if i remember correctly. A
> > > question for everyone else. Why wont the U key work on
> > > the lifts in Kelethin?
> > >
> > > --- Lisa <Lilyanatwin@...> wrote:
> > > > Question........how do you use the keyboard to open
> > > > doors?
